command: from lifesim.world import create_world; from lifesim.types import SimConfig; cfg = SimConfig(width=8, height=8, seed=42); w = create_world(cfg); st = w.get_state(); assert st.width == 8 and st.height == 8 and st.step_number == 0 and len(st.agents) > 0

from lifesim.world import create_world; from lifesim.types import SimConfig; cfg = SimConfig(width=8, height=8, seed=42); w = create_world(cfg); r = w.step(); assert r.world.step_number == 1; assert r.births >= 0 and r.deaths >= 0 and r.movements >= 0

from lifesim.world import create_world; from lifesim.types import SimConfig; cfg = SimConfig(width=8, height=8, seed=42); w1 = create_world(cfg); w2 = create_world(cfg); assert w1.get_state() == w2.get_state(); r1 = w1.step(); r2 = w2.step(); assert r1 == r2, 'not deterministic'
